FightMessage.DieAttacker: You have burned $N to death!
FightMessage.DieVictim: You have been burned to death by $n!
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n has burned $N to death!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: You miss $N with your burning hands.
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n reaches for you with burning hands, but misses!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n tries to burn $N, but $E escapes!
FightMessage.HitAttacker: You burn $N with your hot little hands!
FightMessage.HitVictim: You cry out in pain as $n grabs you with burning hands!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: Your attempt to burn $N nears BLASPHEMY!!!
FightMessage.GodVictim: The pitiful creature before you tries to burn you.
FightMessage.GodRoom: Unaware of the risks, $n tries to burn $N.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: Your lightning bolt kills $N!
FightMessage.DieVictim: You are electrocuted to death by a lightning bolt sent by $n!
FightMessage.DieRoom: The dead body of $N sizzles in the heat from a lightning bolt sent by $n!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: Your lightning bolt scores the ground in front of $N, a misser!
FightMessage.MissVictim: The ground before you is scored as $n misses you with lightning!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $N jumps backwards in time to avoid lightning sent by $n!
FightMessage.HitAttacker: You hit $N with your lightning, bullseye!
FightMessage.HitVictim: You are hit by lightning sent by $n, OUCH!
FightMessage.HitRoom: $N screams in pain as lightning from $n penetrates $M!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: $N stops your lightning with a single gesture, BEWARE!!!
FightMessage.GodVictim: You stop $n's lightning with a sure hand, no time for children's games...
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n's lightning disappears as $N makes a simple gesture.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: You chill $N, remember to put flowers on $S grave...
FightMessage.DieVictim: You feel chilled by $n and then you feel no more -- R.I.P.
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n touches $N who slumps to the ground as a dead lump, rather chilly isn't it?
FightMessage.MissAttacker: The atmosphere turns chilly as you miss $N!
FightMessage.MissVictim: You dodge $n and $s chill touch!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n tries unsuccesfully to chill $N!
FightMessage.HitVictim: You feel your life flowing away as $n chills you!
FightMessage.HitRoom: $n chills $N who suddenly seem less lively!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: Are you trying to chill $N? -- what a joke!!
FightMessage.GodVictim: $n tries to chill you, what a laugh...
FightMessage.GodRoom: $N starts to laugh as $n turns chilly!

FightMessage.DieAttacker: YOU KILLED $N!!! -- don't you feel ashamed...
FightMessage.DieVictim: Your head is filled with all the colors of the rainbow before it bursts!
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n makes $N into a colorful corpse!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: Your spray of color misses $N -- what a dull world...
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n unsuccesfully tries to add color to your life!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n splashes color everywhere except $N.
FightMessage.HitAttacker: Your own private rainbow hits $N in the face -- WOWIE!!
FightMessage.HitVictim: A sudden burst of colors sends you reeling!
FightMessage.HitRoom: $n throws colors at $N who in vain tries to escape!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: Your spray of colors turn into butterflies as $N frowns.
FightMessage.GodVictim: Your frown is enough to turn $n's color spray into little butterflies.
FightMessage.GodRoom: The air is filled with butterflies as $N frowns at $n's color spray.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: $N is dissolved by your goodness.
FightMessage.DieVictim: $n dissolves you, you regret having been so evil, and die...
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n completely dissolves $N!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: $N is unaffected by your goodness!
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n thinks that $e is really good, and tries to dispell you.
FightMessage.MissRoom: $N laughs at $n as $e tries to dispell $M!
FightMessage.HitVictim: $n makes your soul hurt and suffer!
FightMessage.HitRoom: $n makes $N's evil spirit shiver and suffer!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: Did you really expect $M to suffer?
FightMessage.GodVictim: $n unfruitfully tries to dispell you.
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n is stupid...

FightMessage.DieAttacker: The earth opens beneath $N's feet and swallows $M whole!
FightMessage.DieVictim: The earth opens beneath your feet and swallows you whole!
FightMessage.DieRoom: The earth opens beneath $N's feet and swallows $M whole!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: $N desperately tries to keep $S balance as the earth shakes beneath $S feet!
FightMessage.MissVictim: You desperately try to keep your balance as the earth shakes beneath your feet!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $N desperately tries to keep $S balance as the earth shakes beneath $S feet!
FightMessage.HitVictim: You fall down and hurt yourself!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: $N gracefully levitates as the earth shifts beneath $S feet under $M.
FightMessage.GodVictim: You gracefully levitate as the earth shifts underneath you.
FightMessage.GodRoom: $N gracefully levitates as the earth shifts beneath $S feet under $M.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: $N crumples as you kill $M by draining $S energy!
FightMessage.DieVictim: As $n drains your last energy you look forward to the peace of the graveyard...
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n drains the energy of $N who crumples as a lifeless cocoon!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: You need more draining lessons...
FightMessage.MissVictim: Luckily for you $n slept during draining-lessons!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n fails to drain $N -- what a waste of energy!
FightMessage.HitAttacker: You drain $N of some of $S energy!
FightMessage.HitVictim: You feel less energic as $n drains you!
FightMessage.HitRoom: $n drains $N -- what a waste of energy!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: You waste energy trying to drain $N!
FightMessage.GodVictim: How amusing -- $n tries to drain you!
FightMessage.GodRoom: $N's eyes twinkle with laughter as $n tries to drain $M.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: Your fireball hits $N with full force, causing an immediate death!
FightMessage.DieVictim: As you burst into flames of death $n grins evilly...
FightMessage.DieRoom: The heat from a fireball from $n turns $N into a charred corpse!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: Your fireball blooms few feet before $N who claps $S hands in wonder.
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n aims a fireball at you but it blooms few feet before you; you clap your hands at the show.
FightMessage.MissRoom: A fireball from $n misses $N -- what great fireworks around here!!
FightMessage.HitAttacker: You throw a fireball at $N and have the satisfaction of seeing $M enveloped in flames!
FightMessage.HitVictim: You are enveloped in flames from a fireball sent by $n -- OUCH!!
FightMessage.HitRoom: $n smirks as $s fireball explodes into the face of $N!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: How shameful to throw fireballs at a GOD!!!
FightMessage.GodVictim: You choose to ignore $n's shameful attempt to fireball you.
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n's fireball is tactfully ignored by $N.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: As you finish the incantation of the spell, $N falls dead due to the amount of harm $E takes!
FightMessage.DieVictim: You feel light headed as $n completes a spell which causes you so much harm that you just snuff it.
FightMessage.DieRoom: As $n touches $M, $N takes the full brunt of a harm spell and collapses. Dead.
FightMessage.MissAttacker: Swinging out at $N, you miss and your harm spell goes off harmlessly.
FightMessage.MissVictim: You duck out of the way of $n and $s harm spell misses you.
FightMessage.MissRoom: Showing remarkable dexterity, $N avoids $n's reach and subsequent harm spell.
FightMessage.HitAttacker: You watch the pained expression on $N's face as you hit $M with your harm spell.
FightMessage.HitVictim: You grimace in pain as $n's harm spell strikes you.
FightMessage.HitRoom: A large grin crosses $n's face as $s harm spell causes $N grievous pain.
FightMessage.GodAttacker: Harm a god? Are you serious? Of course $N avoids it casually.
FightMessage.GodVictim: $n tries to harm you. Poor sod.
FightMessage.GodRoom: What a buffoon! $n looks somewhat perturbed as $N ignores the recently cast harm spell.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: Your lightning bolt shatters $N to pieces!
FightMessage.DieVictim: You feel enlightened by the lightning bolt $n sends, and then all is darkness -- R.I.P.!
FightMessage.DieRoom: $N recieves the full blast of a lightning bolt from $n... and is no more.
FightMessage.MissAttacker: Your aim goes from bad to worse, and your lightning bolt misses $N!
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n has bad aim and $s lightning bolt misses you!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n tries to hit $N with a lightning bolt but only hits the sky!
FightMessage.HitAttacker: The lightning bolt hits $N with full impact!
FightMessage.HitVictim: YOU'RE HIT! A lightning bolt from $n has reached its goal!
FightMessage.HitRoom: $N wavers under the impact of the lightning bolt sent by $n!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: Your lightning bolt is extinguished as mighty $N moves $S ears!
FightMessage.GodVictim: You move your ears to extinguish $n's lightning bolt.
FightMessage.GodRoom: $N moves $S ears and $n's lightning bolt is extinguished!

FightMessage.DieAttacker: The magic missile tears away the remaining life of $N!
FightMessage.DieVictim: You only have time to notice $n uttering strange sounds before everything is dark!
FightMessage.DieRoom: The magic missile sent by $n causes $N to stagger and collaps in a lifeless heap!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: The magic missile penetrates the air miles above $N.
FightMessage.MissVictim: You don't even have to duck as $n sends a magic missile way over your head.
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n tries in vain to correct the course of the magic missile meant to hit $N.
FightMessage.HitAttacker: You watch with selfpride as your magic missile hits $N!
FightMessage.HitVictim: You stagger as a magic missile from $n hits you!
FightMessage.HitRoom: $n throws a magic missile at $N who staggers under the blow!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: Your magic missile makes $N roar with laughter.
FightMessage.GodVictim: You can't help laughing as $n sends a magic missile at you.
FightMessage.GodRoom: $N starts to roar with laughter as $n sends a magic missile at $M.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: $N dies while looking rather shocked!
FightMessage.DieVictim: $n shocks you. Unfortunately your heart can't stand it...
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n reveals with a shock that $N has left $S body!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: $N rather shockingly evades your grasp!
FightMessage.MissVictim: You nimbly dodge a shocking grasp from $n!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $N shockingly evades the grasp of $n!
FightMessage.HitAttacker: You get a good hold of the shocked $N!
FightMessage.HitVictim: You get a shock as $n gets too close to you!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: You shockingly realize you can't shock $N...
FightMessage.GodVictim: These puny creatures are shocking at times...
FightMessage.GodRoom: The atmosphere gets loaded as $n tries to shock $N!

FightMessage.DieAttacker: $N is dissolved by your evil.
FightMessage.DieVictim: $n dissolves you -- the price paid for leading a good life -- you die...
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n completely dissolves $N!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: $N is unaffected by your evil!
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n thinks that $e is really evil, and tries to dispell you.
FightMessage.MissRoom: $N laughs at $n as $e tries to dispell $M!
FightMessage.HitVictim: $n makes your soul hurt and suffer!
FightMessage.HitRoom: $n makes $N's good spirit shiver and suffer!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: Did you really expect $M to suffer?
FightMessage.GodVictim: $n unfruitfully tries to dispell you.
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n is stupid...

FightMessage.DieAttacker: $N makes a strange sound but is suddenly very silent as you place $p in $S back.
FightMessage.DieVictim: Suddenly $n stabs you in the back, R.I.P....
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n places $p in the back of $N, resulting in some strange noises, a lot of blood, and a corpse.
FightMessage.MissAttacker: $N quickly avoids your backstab and you nearly cut your own finger!
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n tries to backstab you, but you avoid $m!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n tries to backstab $N but nearly cuts $s own finger!
FightMessage.HitAttacker: $N makes a strange sound as you place $p in $S back!
FightMessage.HitVictim: Suddenly $n stabs you in the back!
FightMessage.HitRoom: $n places $p in the back of $N, resulting in some strange noises and some blood!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: $N sends you a look that makes you forget all about backstabbing.
FightMessage.GodVictim: $n tries to backstab you, but changes $s mind.
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n tries to backstab $N, but changes $s mind.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: $N doesn't recover from your bash! -- $E is dead.
FightMessage.DieVictim: As $n bashes at you, you give up living and die...
FightMessage.DieRoom: $N dies after $n has bashed $M!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: As $N avoids your bash, you topple over and fall to the ground!
FightMessage.MissVictim: You dodge a bash from $n who loses $s balance and falls!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $N avoids being bashed by $n who loses $s balance and falls!
FightMessage.HitVictim: $n sends you sprawling with a powerful bash!
FightMessage.HitRoom: $n sends $N sprawling with a powerful bash!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: Your effort to bash $N sends YOU sprawling on the ground.
FightMessage.GodVictim: $n fruitlessly tries to bash you and is sent sprawling.
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n dares a bash at $N and is sent sprawling without touching $M.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: Your kick at $N's kidneys made $M die.
FightMessage.DieVictim: $n kills you by kicking your kidneys in!
FightMessage.DieRoom: $N dies from $n's last kick in $S kidneys!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: Your beautiful full-circle kick misses $N by a mile.
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n makes a nice balletstep which plants $s foot a mile above your head.
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n makes a nice balletstep which plants $s foot a mile above $N's head.
FightMessage.HitAttacker: Your boots need polishing again -- blood all over them...
FightMessage.HitRoom: $n wipes $s boots in the face of $N!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: $N makes you kick at a huge stone appearing from nowhere -- OUCH!
FightMessage.GodVictim: You make $n kick a huge stone appearing from nowhere -- *giggle*
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n starts kicking a huge stone which suddenly appears.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: Your kick at $N's face splits $S head open -- yummy!
FightMessage.DieVictim: $n aims a kick at your face which splits your head in two!
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n neatly kicks $N's head into pieces -- YUMMY!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: You miss your kick at $N's groin, much to $S relief...
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n misses a kick at your groin, you breathe lighter now...
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n misses a kick at $N's groin, much to $N's relief...
FightMessage.HitAttacker: Your kick hits $N in the solar plexus!
FightMessage.HitVictim: You're hit in solar plexus, wow, this is breathtaking!!
FightMessage.HitRoom: $n kicks $N in solar plexus, $N is rendered breathless!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: You attempt to kick $N but lose your balance and fall face down in some mud that has suddenly appeared.
FightMessage.GodVictim: When $n tries to kick you, you quickly make him fall in some mud you have created.
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n falls face down in some mud created by $N.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: You punch $N's head with a blow that crushes $S skull!
FightMessage.DieVictim: $n punches your head with a blow that crushes your skull!
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n punches $N's head so hard that $S skull cracks open!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: You swing your fist at $N, but miss $M!
FightMessage.MissVictim: You barely avoid $n's fist as $e takes a swing at you!
FightMessage.MissRoom: $N barely avoids a blow from $n!
FightMessage.GodAttacker: Your fist flops as your body refuses to fight the mighty $N.
FightMessage.GodVictim: $n seems to be having trouble getting $s body to fight you!!
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n's body rebels against $m when $e tries to punch $N.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: You punch $N in $S kidneys resulting in $S immediate death!
FightMessage.DieVictim: You recieve a punch in your kidneys which ends your worldly misery -- R.I.P.!
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n punches $N in the kidneys causing immediate death!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: You wildly punch at the air, missing $N.
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n misses a wild punch at you.
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n practices shadow-boxing while $N takes a break.
FightMessage.GodAttacker: Instead of letting you punch $M, $N forces you to play Punch and Judy!!!
FightMessage.GodVictim: You convince $n of playing Punch and Judy instead of punching you.
FightMessage.GodRoom: $N convinces $n that no punching is necessary.

FightMessage.DieAttacker: You hit $N with such force that $S neck snaps in two!
FightMessage.DieVictim: $n hits you with such force that your neck snaps in two!
FightMessage.DieRoom: $N's neck is snapped in two by a powerful blow from $n!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: You try to hit $N who easily avoids the blow.
FightMessage.MissVictim: $n tries to hit you but you easily avoid the blow.
FightMessage.MissRoom: $n tries to hit $N who easily avoids the blow.
FightMessage.GodAttacker: You try to hit $N but hit yourself instead!
FightMessage.GodVictim: $n tries to hit you but you hits $mself instead!
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n tries to hit $N but hits $mself instead!

FightMessage.DieAttacker: You hit $N with a blow that breaks $S spine!
FightMessage.DieVictim: $n hits you with a blow that breaks your spine!
FightMessage.DieRoom: $n hits $N with a blow that breaks $S spine!
FightMessage.MissAttacker: $N ducks under your fist as you try to hit $M.
FightMessage.MissVictim: You duck under $n's fist as $e takes a swing at you.
FightMessage.MissRoom: $N ducks under $n's fist as $e takes a swing at $M.
FightMessage.GodAttacker: It isn't polite to swing at a GOD!
FightMessage.GodVictim: $n tries to take a swing at you -- how pathetic!
FightMessage.GodRoom: $n pathetically tries to take a swing at $N - ha!
